description:

This omnidirectional antenna has a linear polarization, an  RP-SMA male connector, and an TPEE/ABS radome material.                     The Pasternack WiFi antenna is ideal for 2.4 GHz Wi-Fi and  ISM applications, WLAN, Bluetooth, IOT, wireless audio  systems, home automation, telemetry, remote monitoring,  wireless data acquisition, 802.11 a/b/g/n/ax, wireless  hotspots.
